name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-bootstrap-slider
title: Bootstrap Slider Web Part Built with jQuery v1.x and Boostrap v3.x
shortDescription: Sample bootstrap slider which pulls the slides from a list inside the SharePoint site. The list is automatically deployed once the app is installed in the SharePoint site.
longDescription: Sample bootstrap slider which pulls the slides from a list inside the SharePoint site. The list is automatically deployed once the app is installed in the SharePoint site.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
